name: Ampharos
AbilityText: Each Pokemon that has any damage counters on it (both yours and your opponent's) can't use any Poke-Powers.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 30 more damage. If tails, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Move an Energy card attached to Ampharos to 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Blastoise
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may look at the top 3 cards of your deck, choose as many Water Energy cards as you like, and attach them to your Pokemon in any way you like. Discard the other cards. This power can't be used if Blastoise is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to all Pokemon (both yours and your opponent's).
Attack2Text: Discard 2 Energy attached to Blastoise. Choose 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. This attack does 60 damage to each of them. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) Blastoise can't use Double Launcher during your next turn.

name: Blaziken
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may choose 1 of the Defending Pokemon. That Pokemon is now Burned. This power can't be used if Blaziken is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Discard 2 Energy attached to Blaziken.

name: Delcatty
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your discard pile for up to 2 basic Energy cards, show them to your opponent, and put those cards on top of your deck in any order. If you do, put 2 damage counters on Delcatty. This power can't be used if Delcatty is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Delcatty. Then, remove 2 damage counters from Delcatty.

name: Dialga
AbilityText: Once during your turn, when you put Dialga from your hand onto your Bench, you may search your discard pile for up to 3 in any combination of Pokemon (excluding Pokemon LV.X) and basic Energy cards. Show them to your opponent and put them on top of your deck in any order.
Attack1Text: Draw cards until you have 7 cards in your hand.

name: Dialga
AbilityText: As long as Dialga is your Active Pokemon, your opponent can't play any Pokemon from his or her hand to evolve his or her Active Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Discard all Metal Energy attached to Dialga.

name: Dialga G
Attack1Text: Your opponent can't play any Trainer cards or Stadium cards from his or her hand during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon already has 2 or more damage counters on it, this attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Gardevoir
AbilityText: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Psychic Energy attached to 1 of your Benched Pokemon to your Active Pokemon. This power can't be used if Gardevoir is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to Gardevoir and the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Gardevoir has no Weakness during your opponent's next turn.

name: Giratina
AbilityText: Once during your turn, when you put Giratina from your hand onto your Bench, you may use this power. Each player shuffles his or her hand into his or her deck and draws up to 4 cards. (You draw your cards first.)
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Giratina
Attack1Text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon).
Attack2Text: Choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking. Look at the card you chose, then have your opponent shuffle that card into his or her deck.

name: Manectric
AbilityText: Prevent all damage done to your Benched Pokemon (excluding any Manectric) by attacks.
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 damage to each Pokemon that has any Poke-Powers (both yours and your opponent's). (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Search your deck for a Lightning Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokemon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Palkia G
Attack1Text: You may switch Palkia G with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Rampardos
AbilityText: Rampardos's attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance, Poke-Powers, Poke-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokemon.
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon would be Knocked Out by this attack, Rampardos does 40 damage to itself.
Attack2Text: Any damage done to Rampardos by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance) until the end of your next turn.

name: Shaymin
Attack1Text: Remove 2 damage counters from Shaymin. The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon is affected by a Special Condition, this attack does 30 damage plus 50 more damage. Then, remove all Special Conditions from the Defending Pokemon.

name: Shaymin
Attack1Text: Attach a Grass Energy card from your hand to Shaymin.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard an Energy attached to Shaymin.

name: Slaking
AbilityText: If Slaking used any attacks during your last turn, Slaking can't attack.
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Slaking by attacks is increased by 50 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Weavile G
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 basic Pokemon SP and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Pokemon SP you have in play.

name: Altaria
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon is Asleep and was damaged or affected by Midnight Eyes during your last turn, the Defending Pokemon is Knocked Out.

name: Banette
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard as many cards as you like from your hand. If you do, put that many damage counters on Banette. This power can't be used if Banette is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Discard an Energy card attached to Banette, and then switch all damage counters on Banette with those on the Defending Pokemon. (If an effect of this attack is prevented, this attack does nothing.)
Attack2Text: You may show your hand to your opponent. If you do and if you don't have any Pokemon in your hand, this attack does 30 damage plus 30 more damage.

name: Bastiodon
AbilityText: As long as Bastiodon has a Pokemon Tool attached to it, remove 1 damage counter from Bastiodon between turns.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Bastiodon during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Bastiodon does 30 damage to itself.

name: Beautifly
Attack1Text: If Beautifly has 2 or less Energy attached to it, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. If Beautifly has 3 Energy attached to it, the Defending Pokemon is now Burned and Poisoned. If Beautifly has 4 or more Energy attached to it, this attack does 20 damage plus 40 more damage and the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep, Burned, and Poisoned.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon has any Resistance, this attack's base damage is 60 damage instead of 30.

name: Blissey
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a card from your hand. If you do, remove 2 damage counters from 1 of your Pokemon. You can't use more than 1 Nurse Call Poke-Power each turn. This power can't be used if Blissey is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand.
Attack2Text: Blissey does 60 damage to itself.

name: Dialga
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your discard pile for a basic Energy card and attach it to Dialga.
Attack2Text: Dialga can't attack during your next turn.

name: Dugtrio
AbilityText: If your opponent's Active Pokemon retreats, put 2 damage counters on that Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage to each Benched Pokemon (both yours and your opponent's). (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Dustox
AbilityText: Prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Dustox by your opponent's Pokemon that is affected by 2 or more Special Conditions.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. If the Defending Pokemon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon has any Poke-Powers or Poke-Bodies, the Defending Pokemon is now Burned and Confused.

name: Empoleon
Attack1Text: Choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking and discard it.
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 70 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) Empoleon can't use Jet Smash during your next turn.

name: Giratina
Attack1Text: You may switch Giratina with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon is Knocked Out by this attack, put the Defending Pokemon and all cards attached to in the Lost Zone instead of the discard pile.

name: Giratina
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Golduck
Attack1Text: If your opponent has any Water Energy attached to any of his or her Pokemon, you may do 30 damage to any 1 Benched Pokemon instead. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: You may move all Energy cards attached to Golduck to 1 of your Benched Pokemon. If you do, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Gyarados G
Attack1Text: Flip a coin for each of your opponent's Pokemon. If that coin flip is heads, this attack does 30 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Does 100 damage minus 10 damage for each damage counter on Gyarados G.

name: Infernape
Attack1Text: Discard as many Fire Energy cards as you like attached to your Pokemon in play. Flip a coin for each Energy card you discarded. This attack does 80 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: Does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Infernape.

name: Kricketune
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage times the number of Kricketot and Kricketune in your discard pile.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon is Asleep, this attack does 50 damage plus 30 more damage. Remove the Special Condition Asleep from the Defending Pokemon.

name: Lickilicky
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 40 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) Before doing damage, discard all Trainer cards attached to that Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed and discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Ludicolo
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. If you do, your turn ends. During your next turn, each of Ludicolo's attacks does 60 more damage to the Defending Pokemon (before applying Weakness and Resistance). This power can't be used if Ludicolo is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: After doing damage, remove from Ludicolo the number of damage counters equal to the damage you did to the Defending Pokemon. Ludicolo can't use Best Dance during your next turn.

name: Luvdisc
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. Search your deck for a Pokemon that is the same type as the Pokemon you chose, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Your opponent may draw a card.

name: Ninetales
Attack1Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. Search your deck for a number of basic Fire Energy cards up to the number of heads and attach them to any of your Pokemon in any way you like. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: If you have more Energy in play than your opponent, the Defending Pokemon is now Burned and Confused.

name: Palkia
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Shaymin
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to Shaymin.
Attack2Text: Remove 2 damage counters from each of your Pokemon.

name: Torterra
Attack1Text: Does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each Grass Energy attached to all of your Pokemon.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Toxicroak G
AbilityText: Prevent all effects of attacks, excluding damage, done to Toxicroak G.
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon is Poisoned, this attack does 20 damage plus 40 more damage.

name: Bronzong G
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may move an Energy card attached to 1 of your Pokemon SP to another of your Pokemon. Then, put 2 damage counters on Bronzong G. This power can't be used if Bronzong G is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon that has any damage counters on it. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Cacturne
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon that has any damage counters on it. This attack does 50 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: You may discard a Grass or Darkness Energy attached to Cacturne. If you discard a Grass Energy, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. If you discard a Darkness Energy, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Carnivine
Attack1Text: Choose 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. This attack does 10 damage to each of them. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Remove 2 damage counters from Carnivine.

name: Cascoon
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a card that evolves from Cascoon and put it onto Cascoon. (This counts as evolving Cascoon.) Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Combusken
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Cranidos
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.
Attack2Text: You may discard any Stadium card in play.

name: Crobat G
AbilityText: Once during your turn, when you put Crobat G from your hand onto your Bench, you may put 1 damage counter on 1 of your opponent's Pokemon.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. Put 2 damage counters instead of 1 on the Defending Pokemon between turns.

name: Flaaffy
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Move an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon to another of your opponent's Pokemon.

name: Grotle
Attack1Text: Remove 1 damage counter from Grotle.

name: Houndoom G
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat or use any Poke-Powers during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: You may discard a Darkness Energy attached to Houndoom G. If you do, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Kirlia
Attack1Text: You may switch Kirlia with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Lombre
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, look at your opponent's hand and choose 1 card, then have your opponent shuffle that card into his or her deck.

name: Lucario
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Mightyena
AbilityText: If Mightyena is affected by a Special Condition, ignore all Energy necessary to use Mightyena's attacks.
Attack1Text: If you played any Supporter card from your hand during this turn, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.
Attack2Text: If Mightyena has less Energy attached to it than the Defending Pokemon, this attack does 50 damage plus 30 more damage.

name: Mismagius
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokemon's attacks. That Pokemon can't use that attack during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Monferno
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard a Fire Energy attached to Monferno.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Muk
AbilityText: If Muk remains affected by any Special Conditions between turns, remove 2 damage counters from Muk.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. If tails, Muk is now Poisoned.
Attack2Text: If Muk is Poisoned, this attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage and the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Octillery
Attack1Text: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Flip a coin for each Energy card you find there. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads. Shuffle the revealed cards back into your deck.
Attack2Text: Any time the Defending Pokemon tries to attack, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing. (If the Defending Pokemon is no longer your opponent's Active Pokemon, this effect ends.)

name: Prinplup
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Probopass
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Seviper
Attack1Text: Remove 4 damage counters from Seviper.
Attack2Text: You may switch Seviper with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Shieldon
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, if Shieldon would be Knocked Out by damage from an attack, Shieldon is not Knocked Out and its remaining HP becomes 10 instead.
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Silcoon
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a card that evolves from Silcoon and put it onto Silcoon. (This counts as evolving Silcoon.) Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Vigoroth
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, Vigoroth does 10 damage to itself.
Attack2Text: If Vigoroth has any damage counters on it, this attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Wartortle
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: Wartortle does 10 damage to itself. Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Wartortle by attacks during your opponent's next turn.

name: Zangoose
AbilityText: Zangoose can't be affected by any Special Conditions.
Attack1Text: Switch the Defending Pokemon with 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. This attack does 20 damage to the new Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon that has any damage counters on it. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Cacnea
Attack1Text: If Cacnea has any Darkness Energy attached to it, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. For each heads, choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon and this attack does 10 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) (You can choose the same Pokemon more than once, but you can't do more than 10 damage to that Pokemon in this way.)

name: Carnivine
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.
Attack2Text: Remove 1 damage counter from each of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Chansey
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, remove 3 damage counters from Chansey. If tails, remove 3 damage counters from the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon already has any damage counters on it, this attack's base damage is 10 instead of 40.

name: Combee
Attack1Text: Draw a card.
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Diglett
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokemon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Dunsparce
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokemon and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Electrike
Attack1Text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Grimer
Attack1Text: Search your deck for Grimer and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Happiny
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Chansey from your hand onto Happiny (this counts as evolving Happiny) and remove all damage counters from Happiny.
Attack1Text: Switch the Defending Pokemon with 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. Remove 2 damage counters from the new Defending Pokemon.

name: Honchkrow G
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 in any combination of Stadium cards or Trainer cards that has Team Galactic's Invention in its name, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 20 damage to that Pokemon. If that Pokemon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Kricketot
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Lapras
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage times the amount of Energy attached to Lapras.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Lickitung
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokemon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.
Attack2Text: Choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking and discard it.

name: Lotad
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to Lotad but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more than 20 damage in this way.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Grass Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokemon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Mareep
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a basic Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Mareep by attacks is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Misdreavus
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your discard pile for a Trainer card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand.

name: Nosepass
Attack1Text: Switch the Defending Pokemon with 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon.

name: Piplup
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Poochyena
Attack1Text: Search your deck for Poochyena and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Psyduck
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent can't play any Trainer, Supporter, or Stadium cards from his or her hand during his or her next turn.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does no damage to the Defending Pokemon. Instead, Psyduck is now Confused.

name: Purugly G
Attack1Text: If your opponent has 6 or more cards in his or her hand, discard a number of cards without looking until your opponent has 5 cards left in his or her hand.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 50 damage plus 30 more damage and Purugly G is now Asleep.

name: Ralts
Attack1Text: Look at the top 5 cards in either player's deck and put them back on top of that player's deck in any order.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Remoraid
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Riolu
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage.

name: Shuppet
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Return Shuppet and all cards attached to it to your hand. (If you don't have any Benched Pokemon, this attack does nothing.)

name: Skitty
Attack1Text: Remove 1 damage counter from each of your Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Skitty does 10 damage to itself.

name: Skuntank G
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have a Stadium card in play, you may use this power. Each Active Pokemon (both yours and your opponent's) (excluding Pokemon SP) is now Poisoned. This power can't be used if Skuntank is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Slakoth
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage times the number of damage counters on Slakoth.
Attack2Text: Remove all damage counters from Slakoth. Slakoth can't attack during your next turn.

name: Swablu
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: You may switch Swablu with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Tauros
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a basic Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, Tauros does 10 damage to itself.

name: Torchic
Attack1Text: During your next turn, Torchic's Fire Shard attack's base damage is 80.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Torkoal
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Burned.
Attack2Text: Move an Energy card attached to Torkoal to 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Turtwig
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Vulpix
Attack1Text: Discard up to 2 Energy cards from your hand. For each card you discarded, draw 2 cards.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Wurmple
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Team Galactic's Invention G-101 Energy Gain
Team Galactic's Invention G-103 Power Spray
Team Galactic's Invention G-105 Poke Turn
Armor Fossil
AbilityText: Whenever Armor Fossil would be damaged by your opponent's attack, flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, reduce that damage by 10.

name: Skull Fossil
AbilityText: During your opponent's turn, if Skull Fossil would be Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack, flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, put 1 damage counter on the Attacking Pokemon.

name: Lotad
AbilityText: If Lotad has any Water Energy attached to it, Lotad's Retreat Cost is 0.
Attack1Text: Remove 1 damage counter from Lotad.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Swablu
Attack1Text: Remove 4 damage counters from Swablu. Swablu can't retreat during your next turn.
Attack2Text: If Swablu was damaged by an attack during your opponent's last turn, this attack does the same amount of damage done to Swablu to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Vulpix
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 Fire Energy cards, show them to your opponent, and put them in your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Grass Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
